          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Uses of gamma rays</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebräuche von gamma Strahlen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisations des rayons gamma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usos de raios gamma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usi dei raggi gamma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρήσεις των ακτίνων γάμμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aplicaciones de rayos gammas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of three illustrations showing the use of gamma rays. Gamma rays can be used to kill bacteria on sealed foods.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bacteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gamma radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gamma rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wrapping</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von drei Abbildungen, die den 
Gebrauch von gamma Strahlen zeigen. Gamma Strahlen können 
benutzt werden, um Bakterium auf Siegelnahrungsmitteln zu beenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de trois illustrations montrant 
l'utilisation des rayons gamma. Des rayons gamma peuvent être 
employés pour détruire des bactéries sur les nourritures scellées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de três ilustrações que mostram o 
uso de raios gamma. Os raios gamma podem ser usados matar as 
bactérias em alimentos selados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di tre illustrazioni che 
mostrano l'uso dei raggi gamma. I raggi gamma possono essere 
usati per uccidere i batteri sugli alimenti sigillati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τη χρήση 
των ακτίνων γάμμα. Οι ακτίνες γάμμα μπορούν να 
χρησιμοποιηθούν για να σκοτώσουν τα βακτηρίδια στα σφραγισμένα 
τρόφιμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de tres ilustraciones que 
muestran el uso de rayos gammas. Los rayos gammas se pueden 
utilizar para matar a bacterias en los alimentos sellados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bakterium</string>
          </keyword>
